net.tridentsdk.plugin.cmd

Class PlatformColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.plugin.cmd.PlatformColor

  • public final class PlatformColor
extends Object
    ANSI codes for coloring the console

    Don't use this class if you need console colors. Use Console

    Since:
    0.3-alpha-DP
    Author:
    The TridentSDK Team

    • Field Summary

    • Field Detail

      • EMPTY

        public static final String EMPTY

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • forColor

        public static String forColor(String color)
        Obtains the colors needed by name

        This is not case-sensitive

        The list of colors which can be retrieved:

        • reset
        • black
        • red
        • green
        • yellow
        • purple
        • cyan
        • white
        • cursoreol2 - ANSI escape which moves the insertion cursor 2 spaces to the right

        Parameters:
        color - the name of the color to retrieve the escape for
        Returns:
        the proper escape code or EMPTY if it does not exist, or if the platform is windows, which does not support color codes or ANSI escapes

      • isWindows

        public static boolean isWindows()
